review.title: “Working environment is not much satisfactory”
review.pros: Pros – Lunch facility is nice and company time is also very flexible.The employee working environment is very friendly.
review.cons: Cons – There is no distinction between a tech support and application developement.There is no any proper performance appraisal.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – The higher authority should look into the problems of the normal employees as there is no performance appraisal and personal growth.The management should know who are actually working for the company.
